stories.text: So every now and then I contemplate on quitting social media apps like Instagram and others because of time I spend on them. But I get this thought that am I weak (mind) in way that I am unable to control myself to spend moderate time on these things instead I am accepting defeat and quitting the platform all together . Does anyone feel like this or people who quit did you do that because you were unable to stop yourself ?
stories.title: Ask HN: Is quitting social media (Instagram, snap) sign of weakness?

Belgian scientific base in Antarctica engulfed by Covid despite strict measures
China harvests masses of data on Western targets, documents show

stories.text:
I know. You may be probably be in a time zone that already made the change to the new year. Or may be you don't care about this made up construct that we call the new year. May be you are right; this is just a social construct that has no bearing on our actual lives. But I don't care. May the next revolution around our nearest star bring you the happiness you always wanted in your life.

And, by the way, thank you for making my life a place full of curiosity earning to learning new stuff. You literally made my life better, HN. Thank you!

And happy 2022. I mean, happy 12022, fellow homo sapiens!
stories.title: Happy New Year HN
